title: Participating in workplace decision-making processes
content:
Scenario: Participating in workplace decision-making processes
    Given the library is deciding new operating hours
    And scheduling changes affect all employees
    When staff input is gathered about the proposed changes
    Then Jordan's schedule preferences are solicited accessibly
    And Jordan can express how changes would affect them
    And Jordan's input is weighted equally with other staff
    And the workplace_elohim ensures Jordan's voice is heard
    And final decisions consider Jordan's needs and preferences
    And Jordan experiences democratic workplace participation
